segments.text: Albert and I need a lot of things to furnish our house.But I don't know where the best place to shop is . Can you give me some advice ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , Carolyn . I'm happy to help you.What kinds of things do you need right now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we have most of the furniture already.We mostly need kitchen utensils , bathroom accessories , cleaning and laundry accessories--things like that.And Albert wants to set up a little off
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , as for Albert , he should go to an office supply store.There ' s a very good one called Office Depot . They have everything he will need.And their prices are good too . It's very convey
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I write that down ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , it's spelled Office and then D - E - P - O - T.It ' s in the Yellow Pages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And as for the kitchen things , do you want very high quality ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I mean , do you want the best quality , or do you want good prices ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Probably good prices . You know we will only be in America for about a year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I suggest you go to K-Mart or Wal-Mart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are those stores ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are very large , discount department stores.That means their prices are very good.And you can find everything you need for the kitchen or bathroom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Even silverware ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , everything.They don't have the most expensive brands , but their quality is usually decent.The main thing is , they have good prices , and they are very convenient .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a friend that said something about a place called Price Club.Do you know about that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have never shopped there , but I think Price Club is a kind of membership store .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does that mean ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That means you have to pay a membership fee to shop there . I have heard they have very good prices on electronics .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Electronics ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Like stereos and televisions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much is the membership fee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure.But if you are only going to stay a year , I don't think Price Club is good to join.They have great deals occasionally.They are very good for people who like to buy new things all
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Thanks for these tips . We really need to buy a lot of little things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know how it is . Moving is very troublesome .
segments.speaker: S2
